data.title: 13 Best Wineries to visit in Ribera del Duero 2024
data.meta_description: Discover the best wineries in Ribera del Duero to visit and wine tourism experiences
data.text:
13 BEST WINERIES TO VISIT IN RIBERA DEL DUERO [2024 LIST]

Below you can find a selection of the 13 Best Wineries to visit in Ribera del Duero, near Valladolid and Burgos, where you can enjoy a multitude of wine tourism activities throughout the year.

If you are looking for other wineries to visit in Castilla y Léon or other areas of Spain use our winery search engine and immerse yourself in the wine culture.

If you decide to visit any of the following wineries, please indicate that you are contacting through Enoturismo Spain and they will treat you especially well.

1. Bodegas Bela

2. Bodegas Valdubón

3. Bodegas Legaris

4. Bodegas Vega Real

5. Bodegas Zifar

6. Dominio Lubiano

7. Bodegas Durón

8. Bodegas Dominio de Cair

9. Bodegas Finca Villacreces

10. Bodegas Monteabellón

11. Bodegas Pago de Peñafiel

12. Bodegas el Lagar de Isilla

13. Bodegas Carramimbre

1. Bodegas Bela

Avant-garde winery, which stands grandiose in the middle of the plain of the appellation, with a combination of wood and glass.

SERVICES

LOCATION

Villalba de Duero, Burgos

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

2. Bodegas Valdubón

Guided tours, tastings and private events just one hour from Madrid. We enhance the value of zero-kilometre and local proposals by pairing them with our renowned wines.

SERVICES

LOCATION

Milagros, Burgos

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

3. Bodegas Legaris

One of the benchmark wineries in the Ribera del Duero DO, whose philosophy is to make wines that reflect the different landscapes and microclimates of the region's villages.

SERVICES

LOCATION

Curiel de Duero, Valladolid

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

4. Bodegas Vega Real

If you want to discover the essence of the Ribera del Duero, come to Vega Real. Very close to Peñafiel, next to a meander of the Duero River, surrounded by centenary poplars, you will find our small winery.

SERVICES

LOCATION

Castrillo de Duero, Valladolid

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

5. Bodegas Zifar

Located in one of the most emblematic buildings of the town of Peñafiel in Mudejar style

SERVICES

LOCATION

Peñafiel, Valladolid

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

6. Dominio Lubiano

Love, work and respect for the terroir as well as for the quality of our wines with a unique identity

SERVICES

LOCATION

Pesquera de Duero, Valladolid

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

7. Bodegas Durón

Our winery in Ribera del Duero is located in Roa, a municipality in the province of Burgos, which is the headquarters of the Regulatory Council of the Ribera del Duero Denomination of Origin. The visit offered at Bodegas Durón lasts approximately 90 minutes and consists of a detailed description of the winemaking process of our wines, discovering the vinification and aging of the same, while contemplating a magnificent Castilian landscape.

SERVICES

LOCATION

La Horra, Burgos

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

8. Bodegas Dominio de Cair

A modern winery, with avant-garde architecture, where nothing is the result of chance, everything in it is designed for what really matters, optimal conditions to create wines of exceptional quality.

SERVICES

LOCATION

La Aguilera, Burgos

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

9. Bodegas Finca Villacreces

Considered the hidden gem of Ribera del Duero, Finca Villacreces is located in the middle of a two-hundred-year-old pine forest and in the heart of the golden mile of the appellation of origin.

SERVICES

LOCATION

Quintanilla de Arriba, Valladolid

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

10. Bodegas Monteabellón

Live an incredible experience visiting our vineyard, discovering the views of the Douro Valley from the viewpoint while we accompany you with one of our wines and an aperitif. Enjoy the magic of the environment among the vineyards.

SERVICES

LOCATION

Nava de Roa, Burgos

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

11. Bodegas Pago de Peñafiel

Winery located in Peñafiel with stunning views over the Ribera del Duero and Peñafiel Castle.

SERVICES

LOCATION

Peñafiel, Valladolid

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

12. Bodegas el Lagar de Isilla

The history of Bodegas El Lagar de Isilla begins in 1995, in the historic winery of the fifteenth century located below the restaurant El Lagar de Isilla in Aranda de Duero at 12 meters deep, where the Zapatero Pintó family, produced the first 50,000 bottles.

SERVICES

LOCATION

La Vid, Burgos

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS

13. Bodegas Carramimbre

In Bodegas Carramimbre we seek the best flavor and the best quality in our wines, investing in effort, perseverance and commitment. Wine lovers can enjoy the entire winemaking process with a guided tour through its winemaking and bottling facilities and a third subway with more than 1000 French and American oak barrels.

SERVICES

LOCATION

Peñafiel, Valladolid

MORE INFO & BOOKINGS
